In England, in the seven days to 18 December, there were 517,580 new confirmed cases (915.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 December, there were 306,911 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 69% (210,669 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 December is 10,011,650 (17,704 cases per 100,000 population).
